channel.title: [FullScreen] Need help
channel.description:
[center]Before I release my crappy pi onto my webhost and make it a webclient, I need to fix this problem it is driving me crazy! I downloaded this: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/488475-317-client-fullscreen.html and when you run it you get this: http://gyazo.com/34b196e4ff983930a7c9a66594a6b388.png if you can see there is an extended boarder around the bottom right corner. How can I make this fit screen without messing up the fullscreen settings? And yes I have messed with the Jframe sizes, it cuts off some of the sprites when I load it. Thanks.
Edit: When I run fullscreen I get this: http://gyazo.com/1c68b87de3652578b9ccbfa9704a6794[/center]

item.title: [FullScreen] Need help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That’s odd, but hey it works.

Read full topic

item.title: [FullScreen] Need help
item.dc:creator: @xKrome xKrome
item.description:
@xKrome wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:520228”][quote author=xKrome link=topic=638722.msg4305462#msg4305462 date=1369701766]

When you run it in eclipse do you select Jframe or client?
It needs to run via jframe.

Ah i run from the client but when i run from jframe it runs as applet… maybe its because im on mac?
[/quote]
That shouldn’t matter with the Jframe being weird.[/quote]

Its because Jframe extends client and client extends rsapplet. Idk ill run on pc and test

Edit: it was just cause i was on mac it works fine on pc! Thanks for all the help!

Read full topic

item.title: [FullScreen] Need help
item.dc:creator: @xKrome xKrome
item.description:
@xKrome wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:520228”]
Click for full
^Fullscreen works…

Normal works.

I see no issue?

Try this jframe.java?

import sign.signlink;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalLookAndFeel;
import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
import java.awt.event.WindowListener;
import java.io.PrintStream;
import java.net.MalformedURLException;
import java.net.*;
import javax.swing.*;



public class Jframe extends client implements ActionListener {

    private static JMenuItem menuItem;
	public static JFrame frame;
	public static JPanel gamePanel;

	public Jframe(String args[]) {
		super();
		try {
			sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(server));
			initUI();
		} catch (Exception ex) {
			ex.printStackTrace();
		}
	}

	public void initUI() {
		try {
			UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName());
			JPopupMenu.setDefaultLightWeightPopupEnabled(false);
			frame = new JFrame("fullscreen client by hot chicks p.s fred cant use it and is fat");
			frame.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
			frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
			gamePanel = new JPanel();

			gamePanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
			gamePanel.add(this);
						
			JMenu fileMenu = new JMenu("hot chicks");

			String[] mainButtons = new String[] { "fred", "hot chicks", "and big tits"};

			for (String name : mainButtons) {
				JMenuItem menuItem = new JMenuItem(name);
				if (name.equalsIgnoreCase("-")) {
					fileMenu.addSeparator();
				} else {
					menuItem.addActionListener(this);
					fileMenu.add(menuItem);
				}
			}

			JMenuBar menuBar = new JMenuBar();
			JMenuBar jmenubar = new JMenuBar();
            Dimension dimension1 = new Dimension(765, 503);
			frame.setMinimumSize(dimension1);
			frame.add(jmenubar);
			menuBar.add(fileMenu);
			frame.getContentPane().add(menuBar, BorderLayout.NORTH);
			frame.getContentPane().add(gamePanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
			frame.pack();

			frame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
			frame.setVisible(true); // can see the client
			frame.setResizable(true); // resizeable frame
			init();
		} catch (Exception e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
		}
}
	public URL getCodeBase() {
		try {
			return new URL("http://" + server + "/cache");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			return super.getCodeBase();
		}
	}

	public URL getDocumentBase() {
		return getCodeBase();
	}

	public void loadError(String s) {
		System.out.println("loadError: " + s);
	}

	public String getParameter(String key) {
			return "";
	}

	private static void openUpWebSite(String url) {
		Desktop d = Desktop.getDesktop();
		try {
			d.browse(new URI(url)); 	
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}
	}

	public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt) {
		String cmd = evt.getActionCommand();
		try {
			if (cmd != null) {
				if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("exit")) {
					System.exit(0);
				}
				if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("fred")) {
					openUpWebSite("http://www.google.com");
				}
				if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("and big tits")) {
					openUpWebSite("http://www.google.com/category/big+tits");
				}	
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}
	}
}

Also, what’s your Run.bat look like?[/quote]

I am using an IDE (eclipse) but @echo off title Client java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

Read full topic

item.title: [FullScreen] Need help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:


Click for full
^Fullscreen works…

Normal works.

I see no issue?

Try this jframe.java?

import sign.signlink;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalLookAndFeel;

public class Jframe extends client implements ActionListener {

    private static JMenuItem menuItem;

	public Jframe(String args[]) {
		super();
		try {
			sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(server));

		} catch (Exception ex) {
			ex.printStackTrace();
		}

	public void initUI() {

			frame = new JFrame("fullscreen client by hot chicks p.s fred cant use it and is fat");
			frame.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
			frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
			gamePanel = new JPanel();

			gamePanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
			gamePanel.add(this);
						
			JMenu fileMenu = new JMenu("hot chicks");

			String[] mainButtons = new String[] { "fred", "hot chicks", "and big tits"};

			for (String name : mainButtons) {
				JMenuItem menuItem = new JMenuItem(name);
				if (name.equalsIgnoreCase("-")) {
					fileMenu.addSeparator();
				} else {
					menuItem.addActionListener(this);
					fileMenu.add(menuItem);
				}
			}

			JMenuBar menuBar = new JMenuBar();
			JMenuBar jmenubar = new JMenuBar();
            Dimension dimension1 = new Dimension(765, 503);
			frame.setMinimumSize(dimension1);
			frame.add(jmenubar);
			menuBar.add(fileMenu);
			frame.getContentPane().add(menuBar, BorderLayout.NORTH);
			frame.getContentPane().add(gamePanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
			frame.pack();

			frame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
			frame.setVisible(true); // can see the client
			frame.setResizable(true); // resizeable frame
			init();
		} catch (Exception e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
		}
}
	public URL getCodeBase() {
		try {
			return new URL("http://" + server + "/cache");
		} catch (Exception e) {
			return super.getCodeBase();
		}
	}

	public URL getDocumentBase() {
		return getCodeBase();
	}

	public void loadError(String s) {
		System.out.println("loadError: " + s);
	}

	public String getParameter(String key) {
			return "";
	}

	private static void openUpWebSite(String url) {
		Desktop d = Desktop.getDesktop();
		try {
			d.browse(new URI(url)); 	
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}
	}

	public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt) {
		String cmd = evt.getActionCommand();
		try {
			if (cmd != null) {
				if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("exit")) {
					System.exit(0);
				}
				if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("fred")) {
					openUpWebSite("http://www.pornhub.com");
				}
				if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("and big tits")) {
					openUpWebSite("http://www.pornhub.com/category/big+tits");
				}	
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}
	}
}

Also, what’s your Run.bat look like?

In JFrame.java find:

Dimension dimension1 = new Dimension(765+16, 503+59);

Change to:

Dimension dimension1 = new Dimension(765, 503); [/quote]

Ive tried this. Try running it then making fullscreen the sprites load funny, ill post a pic for you 1 sec

Gyazo
